headline: Google CEO Sundar Pichai Predicts AI Will Act For You — From Investments To Medical Advice — Calling The Coming Shift 'Really Interesting'
summary: A coming wave of artificial intelligence tools may soon make decisions on behalf of users, from guiding investment choices to reviewing medical treatments. That shift is advancing quickly enough that it could act as an agent for users within the next year, Google CEO Sundar Pichai recently told BBC. CEOs Debate How Far AI Will Go Pichai said AI is advancing fast, and may eventually perform duties now handled by corporate leaders. "That's where it gets really interesting," he said, describing how
